FakeAmazonAPI
Class Customer

java.lang.Object
  FakeAmazonAPI.Customer

public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a customer class. Customer can perform 6 operations. 1. A customer can view the articles of the shop.
2. A customer can view a specific article in the shop
3. A customer can buy an article
4. A customer can remove this article
5. A customer can view his cart
6. A customer can checkout

@author jeremiesimon<\p>
